who_we_are_text: Alma da Beira Alta ASBL, based in Vichten, Luxembourg, is a cultural association dedicated to preserving and promoting Portuguese folklore and traditions.
association_leaders: The association is led by a team of dedicated individuals:
join_us_text: Interested in becoming a member? Contact us for more information.
email_confirmation_message:
Hello {{name}},

Thank you for your registration request at Alma Da Beira Alta. We will review your information and contact you soon.

Best regards,
Alma Da Beira Alta Team
password_reset_email_sent: Password reset email sent! Check your inbox.
password_reset_failed: Failed to send password reset email. Try again.
homepage_intro: Preserving Portuguese folklore through dance, music, and stories.
about_us_intro: Discover the heart and heritage of Alma da Beira Alta.
about_us_paragraph1: Alma da Beira Alta is dedicated to celebrating Portuguese culture, traditions, and community spirit.
about_us_paragraph2: We organize events, workshops, and gatherings to bring people together and share the richness of our heritage.
about_us_paragraph3: Join us to experience authentic Portuguese hospitality, music, cuisine, and more!
team_group_photo_alt: Alma da Beira Alta team group photo
team_group_description: Meet our dedicated team! United by a passion for Portuguese culture and community, we work together to organize events, support our members, and celebrate our heritage.
mission_statement: To celebrate, preserve, and share the rich traditions of Portuguese culture through events, education, and community engagement.
value_community_desc: We foster a welcoming and supportive environment for all.
value_culture_desc: We honor and promote Portuguese heritage, music, and traditions.
value_growth_desc: We encourage learning, participation, and personal development.
hero_description: Join us in preserving and celebrating the rich traditions of Portuguese folklore through dance, music, and community stories that connect us to our heritage.
services_description: Discover the rich Portuguese culture through our diverse offerings that connect community, tradition, and heritage.
cultural_events_desc: Join our authentic Portuguese festivals, celebrations, and cultural gatherings throughout the year.
traditional_dance_desc: Learn authentic Portuguese folk dances from experienced instructors in our weekly classes.
portuguese_language_desc: Improve your Portuguese through conversation groups and cultural immersion activities.
community_support_desc: Connect with fellow Portuguese speakers and build lasting friendships in our welcoming community.
about_description: Alma da Beira Alta is a vibrant Portuguese cultural association dedicated to keeping our rich traditions alive through dance, music, and community connection in the heart of Luxembourg.
authentic_traditions_desc: We practice and teach genuine Portuguese folk dances and cultural traditions passed down through generations.
welcoming_community_desc: Our inclusive community welcomes people of all backgrounds who share a passion for Portuguese culture.
regular_activities_desc: Weekly dance practices, language exchanges, and cultural events keep our community engaged year-round.
dance_caption: Experience the joy and energy of our authentic folk dances
events_description: Join us for authentic Portuguese cultural experiences, from traditional dance performances to community celebrations.
no_events_description: Stay tuned! We're planning exciting cultural events and activities. Check back soon or subscribe to our newsletter.
gallery_description: Discover the vibrant moments from our cultural events, dance performances, and community celebrations.
latest_from_our_community: Latest from our community events and celebrations
no_images_description: We're collecting beautiful moments from our events and activities. Check back soon to see our community in action!
join_title: Join Our Community In 3 Easy Steps
join_description: Becoming part of our Portuguese cultural family is simple. Follow these steps to start your journey with us.
step_1_description: Complete our simple online registration form with your basic information and interests in Portuguese culture.
step_2_description: Our team will review your application and reach out to you within 48 hours with next steps and membership details.
step_3_description: Join our welcoming community! Attend events, participate in dance classes, and become part of our Portuguese family.
testimonials_description: Hear from our community members about their experiences and the impact of our cultural activities.
testimonial_1: Joining Alma da Beira Alta has been one of the best decisions I've made in Luxembourg. The community is so welcoming and the dance classes have helped me connect with my Portuguese roots.
testimonial_2: The cultural events organized by this association are incredible. My children are learning Portuguese traditions and making friends with other Portuguese families. It feels like home.
testimonial_3: As someone who isn't Portuguese but loves the culture, I was worried about fitting in. But everyone here is so inclusive and patient. I've learned so much about Portuguese traditions!
join_testimonials_desc: Become part of our growing community and create your own memorable experiences with Portuguese culture.
newsletter_description: Subscribe to get the latest news about our events, cultural activities, and community updates.
newsletter_privacy: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe at any time.
gallery_page_subtitle: Explore photos from our events, dances, and community moments.
events_page_subtitle: Join our cultural celebrations, performances, and community gatherings.
